compliance_objective: Ensure the applicant is a corporation as defined by law.
explanation: The applicant must be a corporation defined under the Companies Ordinance.
heading: to, the Drug Trafficking (Recovery of Proceeds) Ordinance (Cap. 405); or

compliance_objective: Confirm the applicant is a fit and proper person.
explanation: The Commission must be satisfied that the applicant is fit and proper to be licensed.
heading: to, the Drug Trafficking (Recovery of Proceeds) Ordinance (Cap. 405); or

compliance_objective: Ensure responsible officers are fit and proper.
explanation: At least two responsible officers must be fit and proper persons.
heading: to, the Drug Trafficking (Recovery of Proceeds) Ordinance (Cap. 405); or

compliance_objective: Confirm directors are fit and proper.
explanation: Each director must be a fit and proper person to be associated with the VA service.
heading: to, the Drug Trafficking (Recovery of Proceeds) Ordinance (Cap. 405); or

compliance_objective: Ensure ultimate owner is fit and proper.
explanation: If there is an ultimate owner, they must be fit and proper to be associated with the VA service.
heading: to, the Drug Trafficking (Recovery of Proceeds) Ordinance (Cap. 405); or

compliance_objective: Implement anti-money laundering and anti-terrorist financing policies.
explanation: Conditions may be imposed on the licence regarding AML and CTF policies.
heading: to, the Drug Trafficking (Recovery of Proceeds) Ordinance (Cap. 405); or

compliance_objective: Ensure availability of a responsible officer.
explanation: At least one responsible officer must be available at all times to supervise the VA service.
heading: to, the Drug Trafficking (Recovery of Proceeds) Ordinance (Cap. 405); or

compliance_objective: Prohibit use of unlicensed names.
explanation: The licensed provider must not use a name other than that specified in the licence.
heading: to, the Drug Trafficking (Recovery of Proceeds) Ordinance (Cap. 405); or

compliance_objective: Ensure individuals are licensed to provide VA services.
explanation: The Commission must grant a licence to an individual to provide a VA service only if the individual is accredited to a licensed provider.
heading: RS applies in relation to the making of a decision under this section if the decision falls within section 53ZRS(1).

compliance_objective: Ensure proper application process for licensing.
explanation: The application for a licence must be made in a specified manner and accompanied by a prescribed fee.
heading: RS applies in relation to the making of a decision under this section if the decision falls within section 53ZRS(1).

compliance_objective: Verify the suitability of applicants for licensing.
explanation: The Commission must be satisfied that the applicant is a fit and proper person to be licensed.
heading: RS applies in relation to the making of a decision under this section if the decision falls within section 53ZRS(1).

compliance_objective: Allow the Commission to impose conditions on licenses.
explanation: The Commission may impose conditions on the licence upon granting.
heading: RS applies in relation to the making of a decision under this section if the decision falls within section 53ZRS(1).

compliance_objective: Maintain updated contact information for licensed representatives.
explanation: A licensed representative must keep the Commission informed of their contact details at all times.
heading: RS applies in relation to the making of a decision under this section if the decision falls within section 53ZRS(1).

compliance_objective: Ensure timely reporting of changes in contact information.
explanation: A licensed representative must inform the Commission of any changes in particulars within 7 business days.
heading: RS applies in relation to the making of a decision under this section if the decision falls within section 53ZRS(1).

compliance_objective: Prevent misrepresentation in providing VA services.
explanation: A licensed representative must not use a name other than the one under which they are licensed when providing VA services.
heading: RS applies in relation to the making of a decision under this section if the decision falls within section 53ZRS(1).

compliance_objective: Identify and verify customer identity
explanation: Financial institutions and DNFBPs must identify and verify the customer's identity based on reliable sources.

compliance_objective: Identify and verify beneficial owner
explanation: If there is a beneficial owner, the financial institution or DNFBP must identify and verify the beneficial owner's identity.

compliance_objective: Obtain information on business relationship purpose
explanation: Before establishing a business relationship, institutions must obtain information on the purpose and intended nature of the relationship.

compliance_objective: Identify and verify person acting on behalf of customer
explanation: If a person acts on behalf of the customer, the institution must identify and verify that person's identity.

compliance_objective: Conduct customer due diligence before business relationship
explanation: Customer due diligence measures must be carried out before establishing a business relationship.

compliance_objective: Conduct due diligence for transactions above threshold
explanation: Customer due diligence measures must be carried out before any occasional transaction involving an amount equal to or above $120,000.

compliance_objective: Ensure customer due diligence before establishing a business relationship.
explanation: A financial institution or a DNFBP must carry out customer due diligence measures before establishing a business relationship with the customer.

compliance_objective: Conduct customer due diligence for high-value transactions.
explanation: Customer due diligence measures must be carried out before carrying out an occasional transaction involving an amount equal to or above $120,000 or equivalent.

compliance_objective: Perform due diligence for wire transfers above a specified amount.
explanation: A financial institution must carry out customer due diligence measures before a wire transfer involving an amount equal to or above $8,000.

compliance_objective: Ensure due diligence for virtual asset transfers above a specified amount.
explanation: A financial institution must carry out customer due diligence measures before a virtual asset transfer involving an amount equal to or above $8,000.

compliance_objective: Prohibit establishment of business relationships without due diligence.
explanation: If unable to comply with customer due diligence requirements, a financial institution or DNFBP must not establish a business relationship with that customer.

compliance_objective: Terminate business relationships if due diligence cannot be completed.
explanation: If a financial institution or DNFBP has already established a business relationship but cannot comply with due diligence, it must terminate the relationship as soon as practicable.

compliance_objective: Ensure customer documents are up-to-date and relevant.
explanation: A financial institution or DNFBP must continuously monitor and review customer documents to ensure compliance with the law.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Scrutinize transactions for consistency with customer profile.
explanation: Financial institutions or DNFBPs must conduct appropriate scrutiny of transactions to ensure they align with the customer's risk profile and source of funds.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Identify and examine unusual transactions.
explanation: Financial institutions or DNFBPs must identify transactions that are complex, unusually large, or lack apparent economic purpose and document their findings.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Conduct customer due diligence for unusual or suspicious transactions.
explanation: Financial institutions or DNFBPs must carry out customer due diligence measures when unusual or suspicious transactions occur.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Terminate business relationships if compliance is not possible.
explanation: If a financial institution or DNFBP cannot comply with customer due diligence measures, they must terminate the business relationship promptly.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Verify identity of customers not physically present.
explanation: Financial institutions or DNFBPs must take additional measures to verify the identity of customers who are not physically present.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Verify customer's identity using new documents or data.
explanation: The financial institution must further verify the customer's identity based on documents or data not previously used for verification.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Take supplementary measures to verify customer information.
explanation: The financial institution must take additional measures to verify customer information obtained.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Ensure payments are made through authorized accounts.
explanation: Payments related to the customer's account must be carried out through an account opened in the customer's name with an authorized institution or equivalent.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Obtain senior management approval for politically exposed persons.
explanation: Approval from senior management is required before establishing a business relationship with a politically exposed person.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Establish source of wealth and funds for politically exposed persons.
explanation: Reasonable measures must be taken to establish the source of wealth and funds of the politically exposed person before establishing a business relationship.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Record beneficiary's name in insurance policies.
explanation: The financial institution must record the name of the beneficiary if identified by name.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Obtain sufficient information to identify beneficiaries.
explanation: Sufficient information must be obtained to identify the beneficiary designated by description or other means.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Verify beneficiary's identity at payout.
explanation: The financial institution must verify the beneficiary's identity at the time of payout or when the beneficiary exercises a right under the insurance policy.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Identify beneficial owners of legal persons or trusts.
explanation: The financial institution must identify the beneficial owners if the beneficiary is a legal person or trust.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Verify identities of beneficial owners in high-risk situations.
explanation: If there is a high risk of money laundering or terrorist financing, reasonable measures must be taken to verify the identities of beneficial owners.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Ensure accurate information is included in wire transfer messages.
explanation: A financial institution that is an ordering institution must include specific information in the message or payment form for wire transfers equal to or above $8,000.
erc_3643: function includeTransferInformation(uint256 amount, string memory originatorInfo, string memory recipientInfo)
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Ensure partial information is included for lower-value wire transfers.
explanation: For wire transfers below $8,000, the financial institution must include certain information in the message or payment form.
erc_3643: function includePartialTransferInformation(uint256 amount, string memory originatorInfo, string memory recipientInfo)
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Provide requested information to relevant authorities within a specified timeframe.
explanation: A financial institution may include limited information for domestic wire transfers but must provide additional information upon request within 3 business days.
erc_3643: function provideRequestedInformation(string memory requestor, uint256 requestId)
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Obtain missing information for domestic wire transfers promptly.
explanation: If a beneficiary institution does not receive required information with a domestic wire transfer, it must obtain the missing information as soon as practicable.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Ensure all required information is obtained for non-domestic wire transfers.
explanation: A beneficiary or intermediary institution must obtain any missing information for non-domestic wire transfers as soon as practicable.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Obtain and record necessary information for virtual asset transfers.
explanation: Before carrying out a virtual asset transfer, the ordering institution must obtain and record specific information about the originator and recipient as outlined in the law.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Submit required information to beneficiary institution for virtual asset transfers.
explanation: The ordering institution must submit the recorded information to the beneficiary institution based on the amount of the virtual asset transfer.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Obtain and record information from the ordering institution.
explanation: The beneficiary institution must obtain and record the information submitted by the ordering institution regarding the virtual asset transfer.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Transmit all received information in virtual asset transfers.
explanation: An intermediary institution must transmit all information it receives with the transfer to the institution to which it passes on the transfer instruction.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Obtain missing information or mitigate risks if information is incomplete.
explanation: If the instructed institution does not receive complete information, it must obtain the missing information or take measures to mitigate risks.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Collect sufficient information about proposed respondent banks.
explanation: Before establishing a correspondent banking relationship, an authorized institution must collect sufficient information about the proposed respondent bank.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Ensure adequate anti-money laundering controls before establishing a correspondent relationship.
explanation: An authorized institution must not establish a correspondent banking relationship unless it is satisfied with the anti-money laundering controls of the proposed respondent bank.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Obtain senior management approval to establish business relationships in high-risk situations.
explanation: In high-risk situations, a financial institution must obtain approval from senior management before establishing a business relationship.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Prohibit anonymous accounts
explanation: A financial institution or a DNFBP must not open or maintain any anonymous account or account in a fictitious name for any customer.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Prohibit correspondent banking relationships with shell banks
explanation: An authorized institution must not establish or continue a correspondent banking relationship with a corporation that does not have a physical presence in its jurisdiction.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Ensure customer due diligence through intermediaries
explanation: A financial institution or a DNFBP may carry out customer due diligence measures by means of an intermediary if the intermediary consents in writing and can provide documents on request.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Maintain liability for customer due diligence
explanation: A financial institution or a DNFBP remains liable under this Ordinance for a failure to carry out customer due diligence measures, even when using an intermediary.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Establish procedures for identifying politically exposed persons.
explanation: A financial institution or a DNFBP must establish and maintain effective procedures for determining whether a customer or a beneficial owner of a customer is a politically exposed person.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Identify and handle wire transfers in compliance with regulations.
explanation: A financial institution that carries out wire transfers must establish and maintain effective procedures for identifying and handling wire transfers in relation to which section 12(5) has not been complied with.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Identify and handle virtual asset transfers in compliance with regulations.
explanation: A financial institution that carries out virtual asset transfers must establish and maintain effective procedures for identifying and handling virtual asset transfers in relation to which section 13A(4) has not been complied with.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Keep records of transactions.
explanation: A financial institution or a DNFBP must keep the original or a copy of the documents, and a record of the data and information, obtained in connection with each transaction.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Keep records of customer identification and verification.
explanation: A financial institution or a DNFBP must keep the original or a copy of the documents, and a record of the data and information, obtained in the course of identifying and verifying the identity of the customer or any beneficial owner of the customer.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Maintain records for a minimum period.
explanation: Records required to be kept must be kept for a period of at least 5 years beginning on the date on which the transaction is completed.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Maintain customer records throughout the business relationship.
explanation: Records required to be kept must be kept throughout the continuance of the business relationship with the customer and for a period of at least 5 years beginning on the date on which the business relationship ends.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Comply with extended record-keeping requirements from authorities.
explanation: A financial institution or a DNFBP must keep the relevant records for the period specified in a notice from a relevant authority or regulatory body if required.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Ensure compliance with AML/CFT requirements in branches and subsidiaries outside Hong Kong.
explanation: A financial institution must ensure that its branches and subsidiaries outside Hong Kong have procedures in place for compliance with AML/CFT requirements similar to those applicable in Hong Kong.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Inform relevant authorities and mitigate risks when local laws prevent compliance.
explanation: If local laws do not permit compliance with AML/CFT procedures, the financial institution must inform the relevant authority and take additional measures to mitigate risks.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Ensure compliance with AML/CFT requirements in DNFBP branches and subsidiaries outside Hong Kong.
explanation: A DNFBP must ensure that its branches and subsidiaries outside Hong Kong have procedures in place for compliance with AML/CFT requirements similar to those applicable in Hong Kong.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Inform relevant authorities and mitigate risks when local laws prevent compliance for DNFBPs.
explanation: If local laws do not permit compliance with AML/CFT procedures, the DNFBP must inform the relevant authority and take additional measures to mitigate risks.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Prevent contraventions of AML/CFT requirements.
explanation: A financial institution or DNFBP must take all reasonable measures to ensure proper safeguards exist to prevent contraventions of any AML/CFT requirements.
heading: to the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Cap. 571).

compliance_objective: Ensure that virtual asset exchange operations are conducted in compliance with legal obligations.
explanation: The provision mandates that a VA exchange must regularly make or accept offers to sell or purchase virtual assets, resulting in binding transactions, and must handle client money or virtual assets.
erc_3643: function makeOffer(uint256 amount, address asset), function acceptOffer(uint256 offerId), function handleClientFunds(address client, uint256 amount)
heading: B
